name: The Eleventh Hour
description:
The Eleventh Hour is a top-down horror game about exploring a mansion in search of your brother.

This game was made as a part of the aztec game jam.

credits to:

Carter Andrews : designer, programmer
Eric De Anda: designer, programmer
Kevin Fong:modeling
Byron Beasley music composer
